Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Reroute at 104th/Torrence
ShortDescription: 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Commercial, 95th, Colfax, Torrence & 104th due to a street blockage nr 104th/Torrence.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Commercial, 95th, Colfax, Torrence and 104th due to a street blockage near 104th/Torrence.
